Message:
We’ve been inseparable
since the day she came
into my life.

But the only one
who knows this is me.

I’m all she has,
just as she’s all I have.

She’s kinda crazy,
flipping out over
things she doesn’t like.

But she loves snacks—
just like me.

So, when it looks like
she’s about to lose it,
I start snacking.

That way, she’ll stay put...
and never come out.
